member.name: M:SmokingGunInc.Multiples.IMultiplesService.DetermineMultiple(System.Int32,System.UInt64[])
member.summary: Determines the number on the given in the sorted list of numbers in the form n = F1^f1 * F2^f2 * ... * Fn^fn where Fi is an element of and fi is an integer greater or equal to 0.
member.param: The position in the list of the number to be calculated. must be between 1 and 13282 inclusive.
Collection of factors to use for the computation
member.returns: The value of the number in the list that takes the position .
